name: Carrier
description: Carrier is a Free-to-Play timing-based puzzle game. It puts you in control of an operator who must modify and encrypt a transmission signal to avoid interception.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Pentium 4 2.2 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Motherboard Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 80 MB available space
